Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.Model.Ship

Class Destroyer

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.Model.Ship.Destroyer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IShip, Serializable
public class Destroyer extends Object implements IShip, Serializable
Destroyer: a ship occupying two cells (size = 2). Keeps track of hits and sunken state.
See Also:

    • isSunken

      public boolean isSunken()
      Indicates whether the ship has been sunk.
      Specified by:
      isSunken in interface IShip
      Returns:
      true if the ship is sunk, false otherwise

    • registerHit

      public void registerHit()
      Registers a hit on the ship.

      Each hit increments the hit counter. When the number of hits reaches or exceeds the ship size, the ship is marked as sunk.

      Specified by:
      registerHit in interface IShip

    • getHitCount
